text:
Quantcast | San Francisco, CA | Front End/Full Stack Engineer | Full-time | Onsite

Are you interested in connecting clients with insights based on massive data? The Brand team evaluates over 100 billion transactions a day, in real-time determining how to respond. As a front end/full stack engineer you will be responsible for building web applications that deliver clear and powerful insights into how we are making these decisions to our clients. You will own the development of new web features from design, implementation and testing to release.

Front end: https://www.quantcast.com/careers/ef9f224e-9619-4c37-899b-03... Full Stack: https://www.quantcast.com/careers/7205c1f3-5e7d-4b77-b844-25...

Quantcast is fast growing, pre-ipo and honored as a Glassdoor Best Place to Work in 2015 & 2016
